The 7th International Sanskrit Computational Linguistics Symposium is scheduled on February 15-17, 2024 and will be held at Auroville, Puducherry, India

Conference Location

Unity Pavilion, Auroville, Puducherry, India

Accommodations

We have partnered with Ostel on Auroville Repos beach for accommodation. Rates have been substantially discounted for the event.

A bus service will be provided to the conference venue (Unity Pavilion) each morning and afternoon 15-17th February.

Note: All accommodation is for 4 nights from 14-18th February giving you time to arrive 1 day before the symposium and depart 1 day after. If you wish to arrive earlier or extend longer please put it in your "special requests" section.

If paying with an Indian debit or credit card please note 3-D Secure (3DS) is mandatory for payments online in India and please ensure your card is enabled for international payments, kindly request your bank to enable it if it is not. In case you face difficulty with payments please write to iscls@sri.auroville.org for alternatives.
